articles.author: Sruthi Shankar, Ankur Banerjee
articles.title: China stimulus pushes global shares to new peak, boosts commodities - Reuters
articles.description: World stocks hit a record high on Tuesday after China unveiled stimulus measures to support its economy and stock markets, sending Asian and European shares higher and triggering a bounce in commodity prices.

articles.author: David Lewis, Jessica Donati, Kaylee Kang
articles.title: Why West Africa is now the world's terrorism hotspot - Reuters
articles.description: Conflict in the sub-Saharan Sahel region rarely garners global headlines, yet it is contributing to a sharp rise in migration towards Europe.
